In my time in the military I have spent time working as a technician, a supervisor, a manager, and a mentor.  I used those values to support Navy fleet readiness.  I plan on using those same skills I have learned over the last 9 years in the Navy as well as life skills to bring a new perspective to the software development world. projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This was an amazing experience and a project that is near to my heart.  In this application I mad a Salmon Cookie stand and generated sales and rendered the sales using JavaScript, HTML and CSS.  This application is important because how challenging it was for my skill level at the time.

projects.title: Flash.me
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. This was my first group project I did for the completion of my Codefellows 201 class.  I completed this project with Joshua Frazer, Matthew Gebhart, and Ari Palmer.  We came together to create a flashcard application that will allow users to create and render new decks that they can use to study JavaScript, CSS, and HTML topics
